validation-problem-response.description: Your request was not constructed properly. Response contains the list of validation errors for each invalid element of your request. For complete list of possible validation errors see [validation errors]() classification.

default-error-response.description: Besides specific status codes above, other standard http [status codes](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html) can be returned for each request. To learn more see general guidance on [error handling]()
